donate.description: Donate button of the tab which opens when you install PreMiD for the first time

tab.troubleshooting.subHeading.description: Subtitle of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, {0} will be replaced with 'PreMiD' -> {0} is a variable and should not be translated

tab.troubleshooting.checks.extensionEnab.description: Check 1 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.internetConne.description: Check 2 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.appConnection.description: Check 3 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.discordConnec.description: Check 4 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.troubleshooting.checks.discordStatus.description: Check 5 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a question mark (?) since we can't check this

tab.troubleshooting.checks.presenceToDis.description: Check 6 of the tab which opens when you click on the troubleshooting button, in front of the text will be a checkbox (✓) or a cross (✗) depending on the result

tab.updated.linkYourDiscordAccountDescri.message: 从 v2.6.0 版本开始，PreMiD需要一个关联的Discord账户才能正常工作。请链接您的Discord账户以继续使用PreMiD。

tab.updated.whatsNextDescription.message: 我们希望您喜欢新的更新！如果您有任何反馈或建议，请随时加入我们的Discord服务器并告知我们。

tab.installed.activitySettingsPath.message: 用户设置 {0} 活动设置 {0} 活动隐私

tab.installed.linkDiscordAccountDescript.message: 这允许PreMiD将您当前的活动显示为状态消息。

tab.installed.nextStep.description: Prompt to move to the next step

tab.installed.enableActivityStatusDescri.description: Description of the prompt to enable activity status
tab.installed.enableActivityStatusDescri.message: 确保您已启用“将当前活动显示为状态消息”选项，否则没人会看到您炫新的状态。

tab.installed.enableActivityStatusPrompt.message: 启用“将当前活动显示为状态消息”。

tab.installed.setupComplete.message: 一切设置完毕，准备好开始使用了！我们希望您喜欢使用PreMiD。如果您有任何问题或需要帮助，请随时加入我们的Discord服务器。如果您像我们一样喜欢PreMiD，可以通过捐赠、评价扩展或与朋友分享来支持我们。
